snippet: A British businessman who sold fake bomb detectors was sentenced to 10 years in prison for fraud on Thursday.
abstract: British businessman James McCormick, who made estimated $77.8 million selling fake bomb detectors, is sentenced to 10 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A British businessman who sold fake bomb detectors was sentenced to 10 years in prison for fraud on Thursday.

headline.main: Britain: Businessman Sentenced for Selling Fake Bomb Detectors
headline.print_headline: Britain: Businessman Sentenced For Selling Fake Bomb Detectors
